page.title: 19CHILDRENS' CONCERNS IN l985
page.content: Things which concern the children in l985:- l.NATIONAL/INTERNATIONAL PROBLEMS (a) Growth of violence. News reports on TV and newspapers show a disturbing rise in violent crime and terrorism throughout the world. (b) Nuclear war:- A constant threat, with continuing "arms race", between developed countries. (c) Famine:- In Ethiopia and the Sudan in N.Africa. Millions of people dying of starvation, with poor response from parts of the world .Athough Bob Geldorf and others, and "Live Aid" pop concert raised over Â£60,million. (d) Unemployment:- The prospect of us having no job when we leave school. (e) Conservation:- Loss of wildlife species through hunting e.g. the whale. 2.LOCAL ISSUES:- Demolition, Infilling, Vandalism, Graffitti, Low flying military aircraft.
